actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the first Monday in May of each year as "National 70 Plus Day."

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the fourth Wednesday in October of each year as "National 70 Plus Day" in honor of our senior citizens.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating the first Monday in May of each year as "National 70 Plus Day."
